title: Observations upon a late book, entituled, An essay to the advancement of musick, &c., written by Thomas Salmon ... by Matthew Locke ...
author: Locke, Matthew, 1621 or 2-1677.
publisher: Printed by W.G., and are to be sold by John Playford at his shop ...,
notes: Salmon replied to this criticism with his Vindication of An essay to the advancement of musick.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
